Package kueres.location

Interface LocationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultLocationService
public interface LocationService
An interface for all functions provided by the location service. A custom implementation for this interface can be provided by implementing this interface and marking the implementation as @PrimaryBean
Since:
Feb 24, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tim Engbrocks, tim.engbrocks@student.kit.edu

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String addPOI​(java.lang.String name, double[] coordinates)
    Add a point of interest (POI) to the location service.
    double[] addressToCoordinates​(java.lang.String address)
    Convert an address to coordinates.
    double calculateDistance​(double[] pointA, double[] pointB)
    Calculate the distance in meters between two points.
    java.lang.String coordinatesToAddress​(double[] coordinates)
    Convert coordinates to an address.
    java.util.List<java.lang.String> findInRadius​(double radius, double[] center)
    Find all points of interest (POIs) in a circle.
    void removePOI​(java.lang.String id)
    Remove a point of interest (POI) from the location service.

  • Method Details

    • addressToCoordinates

      double[] addressToCoordinates​(java.lang.String address)
      Convert an address to coordinates.
      Parameters:
      address - - the address that should be converted
      Returns:
      the corresponding coordinates: {longitude, latitude}.

    • coordinatesToAddress

      java.lang.String coordinatesToAddress​(double[] coordinates)
      Convert coordinates to an address.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - - the coordinates that should be converted: {longitude, latitude}
      Returns:
      the corresponding address.

    • addPOI

      java.lang.String addPOI​(java.lang.String name, double[] coordinates)
      Add a point of interest (POI) to the location service.
      Parameters:
      name - - the name of the POI
      coordinates - - the location of the POI: {longitude, latitude}
      Returns:
      an identifier of the POI.

    • removePOI

      void removePOI​(java.lang.String id)
      Remove a point of interest (POI) from the location service.
      Parameters:
      id - - the POIs identifier

    • findInRadius

      java.util.List<java.lang.String> findInRadius​(double radius, double[] center)
      Find all points of interest (POIs) in a circle.
      Parameters:
      radius - - the radius of the circle.
      center - - the center point of the circle: {longitude, latitude}
      Returns:
      the identifiers of all POIs in that circle.

    • calculateDistance

      double calculateDistance​(double[] pointA, double[] pointB)
      Calculate the distance in meters between two points.
      Parameters:
      pointA - - {longitude, latitude}
      pointB - - {longitude, latitude}
      Returns:
      the distance between pointA and pointB in meters.
